topic.topicDialog:
Your teachers might use Kerboodle to set Test Yourself activities for you to complete. These tests are automatically marked by Kerboodle so they can help with your revision and can be used to track your progress.

Follow these steps to access and complete the Tests.

step.stepTextTip:
Once logged into Kerboodle, access your course by clicking on the course name on your homepage.

Tip: any current assignments and tests can also be accessed from the Today's Events panel.

Tests will be listed in the Assignments panel on your course page.

Just click on the title to launch the test.
The test will open in a new window, click on the Start Test button to get started.

Select your answers to each question, and use the Next Question button to move through the test.

Once you've finished, click on the Submit Test button.
Once submitted, you'll be given your results on-screen. For more indepth information, click on the Question Feedback button.
The question feedback will explain the answer to you and where possible, refer you back to the relevant chapter / section of the course to revise.
